Anthropic quietly published the best guide to prompt Claude on a Google Sheet. Here's the link:

https://lnkd.in/d6AyZSb4

It goes through:
☑ How to assign Claude a role
☑ How to separate data from orders
☑ How to fix Claude's output format
☑ Prompt basics Claude understands
☑ How to trim Claude's hallucinations
☑ How to show Claude short examples
☑ How to speak clear & direct to Claude
☑ How to design big, multi-step prompts
☑ How to make Claude think step-by-step

I will cover the key parts on my Substack here: https://lnkd.in/dYR5dqUZ
